metadata.description: Contingency Planning - Backup, disaster recovery, business continuity - MAPPED

controls.Name: CP-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document contingency planning policy and procedures
Establish contingency planning roles and responsibilities
Define contingency planning processes and workflows
Create contingency planning documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through contingency planning, disaster recovery, and business continuity capabilities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated validation of contingency plan requirements and backup procedures
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced contingency planning validation for CP-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of recovery time objectives and backup performance
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced recovery monitoring for CP-6 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated testing of DNS failover capabilities for contingency operations
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced failover testing for CP-7 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of contingency plan compliance and effectiveness
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced compliance monitoring for CP-4 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated risk assessment and prioritization for contingency planning
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced risk assessment for CP-1 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated tracking and monitoring of contingency planning activities
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced activity tracking for CP-3 compliance
